code: import axios from'axios';import ENV from'./../config/base-env';export const login=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.username);formData.set('password',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.password);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/login"),formData,{});};export const loginNoPass=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/login-no-pass"),formData,{});};export const loginNoPassValidate=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);formData.set('code',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.code);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/login-no-pass-validate"),formData,{});};export const forgotPassword=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/forgot-password"),formData,{});};export const resetPassword=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('token',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.token);formData.set('password',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.password);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/reset-password"),formData,{});};export const activateAccount=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/activate-account"),formData,{});};export const activateAccountValidate=params=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('token',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.token);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/activate-account-validate"),formData,{});};
